== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&ordm;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ba/index.htm U+000BA].
  * `&ordm` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ba/index.htm U+000BA].
